name: topk_d151936_k20
description: Top-k selection with k=20 from vocabulary size 151936. Used for Qwen3 top-k sampling.
reference:
import torch

@torch.no_grad()
def run(input):
    batch_size, vocab_size = input.shape
    k = 20
    
    # Check constants
    assert vocab_size == 151936
    
    values, indices = torch.topk(input, k, dim=-1)
    return values, indices
